page.title: 17Down Court -near Slad (2)
page.content: The reserve holds a large range of plants,including orchids,and there are are over 200 types of butterflies and moths. The roads are poor, and even Slad, on the main road,has only an infrequent bus service.There is no local shop but the postman delivers shopping as well as letters to an elderly lady.Snow is a problem in winter.In 81/82 a car had to be left on the main road until Easter. Some of the film'Cider with Rosie'was made at Down Court. {Marion Hearfield { Many birds and animals live nearby -among them are Green and Lesser Spotted Woodpeckers,Nightingales, Buzzards,3 owls(Tawny,Brown and Little)...stoats,weasles,foxes and escaped Deer. {Joe Rainger.
